main event: A bright light, elliptical in shape, was observed moving at a very high speed over Dallas, Texas, in 1952, with approximately 300-400 witnesses at a drive-in theater.
interesting points: The object hovered stationary for several minutes before moving rapidly across the sky,The control tower operator reported a bright light moving from north to south at high speed,The object was silent and showed no exhaust or other features,Many attendees at the drive-in theater reported similar observations,The incident was reported in detail to the Air Force for further investigation.
